predicate.note: Frames file for 'contact' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

roleset.name: to bring or come into contact

example.name: passive
example.text: He says [0] Campbell was n't even contacted [*-1] by the magazine for the opportunity [*] to comment .

example.name: transitive
example.text: It 's understood that MGM\/UA recently contacted Rupert Murdoch 's News Corp. , which [*T*-1] made two failed bids for the movie studio , [*] to see if the company was still interested .
example.arg: Rupert Murdoch 's News Corp. , which [*T*-1] made two failed bids for the movie studio ,
